findings.title: Draining all funds from the contract
findings.description: The `channel.poolContribution` value is not updated in the `reactivateChannel` function allowing to drain all funds from the contract by repeated invocations of `deactivateChannel` and `reactivateChannel`.

findings.title: Users unable to claim fair share of interest
findings.description: The claimInterest function does not work as intended, users with equal userHolderWeight will get different payouts based on who was the first one to claim.
